y0 = [0.0091; 0.1277; 35.4463];

beta_save = 0.109000000000000
gamma_save = 0.370000000000000

[t,y] = ode45(@(t,y) odefcn(t,y, beta_save,gamma_save), tspan, y0);
plot(t,y,'-o')
